action_output_list: The user wants to create a new album and move images to it in Simple Gallery Pro. First, I need to open the app.{"action_type": "open_app", "app_name": "Simple Gallery Pro"}
To create a new album, I need to open the options menu.{"action_type": "click", "index": 15}
The goal is to create a new album. The current screen shows a menu with the option "Create new folder".{"action_type": "click", "index": 26}
I need to input the name of the new album, which is 'Favorites'. The text field is at index 14.{"action_type": "input_text", "text": "Favorites", "index": 14}
I need to confirm the creation of the new album by clicking the "OK" button.{"action_type": "click", "index": 72}
I need to navigate back to the main screen to select the images from the Camera album.{"action_type": "navigate_back"}
The current screen shows the contents of the "Internal/" directory. I need to navigate back to the main screen of the app to select the "Camera" album.{"action_type": "navigate_back"}
The current screen shows a list of folders. To select images from the Camera album, I need to click on the "Camera" folder.{"action_type": "click", "index": 2}
To select images, I need to enable the selection mode. I can do this by long pressing on an image.{"action_type": "long_press", "index": 6}
I need to select two more images to move them to the "Favorites" album. I will click on the image at index 7 to select it.{"action_type": "click", "index": 7}
I need to select two more images to fulfill the requirement of selecting three images.{"action_type": "click", "index": 8}

I have selected three images. Now I need to find the "Move to" option to move the selected images to the "Favorites" album. I will click on the "More options" button to find the "Move to" option.{"action_type": "click", "index": 15}

The user wants to move the selected images to the "Favorites" album. The current screen shows options after clicking the "More options" button. I need to find the "Move to" option in the list. Since it's not visible, I should scroll down.{"action_type": "scroll", "direction": "down"}
